data.text:
Team members

Jin Jialing

Hi, my name is Jin Jialing, and my English name is Joyce. I'm an eleven grade student from Hangzhou. The subject that I like most is math. As for my hobbies, I would like to listen to crosstalk in my free time, and I also ski during holidays. When working, I am relatively calm and responsible. In my spare time, I can also integrate well with my classmates and play various jokes with them. And have certain leadership and Organizational communication ability. I am quite optimistic and always approach difficulties or setbacks with a positive attitude. I hope to get along well with my classmates and learn biology together in the upcoming igem competition days.

Zhang Boxuan

Hi guys, my name is Zhang Boxuan and you can call me Jim Zhang in English. I'm presently in grade 10th and going to be an senior next year. I was seeking for a chance to experience an academical experiment during my high school life and attending the wet team of Igem competition gave me a chance. While in school, my main subject was physics and chemistry for the last two years, which gave me a hard time of understanding the subject we are concentrating on. In order to play a better role in the team, I learnt biology by myself which highly improved the diversity of my science knowledge. The experiments we did also gave me an extraordinary experience to my high school life. Furthermore, while doing experiments, I also tried to play the role as a leader in my team, which gave me a valuable experience of leading a scientific team and the confidence to be a leader in a team. I believe that the processes we are making are excellent and the product we are producing would also work well in the market. The team P-DENV would pass all the hardship and difficulties then achieve success.

Wang Jingxi

Hi, my name is Wang Jingxi and my English name is Alexis. I am a 10th grader from Emma Willard School in Troy, NY. I have a golden retriever. He is almost 7 years old. My family and I love to take him out to hike and hang out with his friends. I like to swim, play tennis, and paint when I am free. Since I am a curious person who wants to explore different fields and navigate myself to prepare for my college life, I like to attend amazing competitions like IGEM. I always ended up learning so much more than what I expected. More importantly, each time I get to meet awesome people of similar age as me and improve with them together.

Li Guanxi

My name is Li Guanxi. I did the foundation programme of IB courses at UWCCSC in the first year of my high school life where I really met my dreams and ambitions. Through the values the school taught to us students, I indeed want to create a Utopia with no exploitation and oppression. All of these I considered to start with “Who am I?” and “How the current world consists of?”. Those questions have been deeply covered in my inner heart and become a catalyst for me to study Chemistry and Physics. In addition, I do care about equality and balance among all nature habits which could achieve my aims. I attend clubs,“THEM”which offers stray animals a better place to live in around the campus and also improves the condition of local animal shelters, also a club of gardening which can provide me an opportunity to get closely to natural life. While I put a lot of attentions on Theology that provides me insights into another way that I can access to the truth of the world.

Jia Yuxiang

"Hello, everyone! My name is Jia Yuxiang and I am a high school student in my first year of study. Currently, I am attending an international school in Wuhan. In addition to my regular studies, I have also been participating in online classes from a high school in the United States. which is why I plan to major in this field in the future. My ultimate goal is to study at a reputable university in California. To pursue my interests in biology, I recently took part in the I G E M Biology Competition, which has brought me great joy and satisfaction. Apart from academics, I am an active and outgoing person. I enjoy playing badminton and occasionally indulge in gaming during my free time. These activities help me relax and unwind. Thank you for your attention, and I look forward to getting to know all of you better."

Zhou Jiayi

Hi, my name is Zhou Jiayi or Kevin Zhou in English. I'm from Beijing, China, and one of my favorite hobbies is scuba diving. I have licenses for it too! One of my favorite quotes is by Marie Curie: 'Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less.'

Zhou Yijin

Hello, I'm Zhou Yijin.I'm a rising junior attending a private high school in Florida.My dream major is biochemistry or neurology.I'm also continuously working toward my goal.Apart from academics, I love Fineart and sports.I'm a musical actor at school and won an award.I have appeared in many musicals, such as Chicago and The Music Man.I'm also a member of the swimming varsity. In addition, I have joined many public benefit organizations, including the Tanzania trip in March 2023. I am glad to join IGEM 2023, See You Soon!

Chen Sien

Hello everyone! I am Chen Sien and my English name is Jackson. I am 17 years old and studying at Xiamen No.6 High School of Fujian. My hobbies are cooking,playing basketball and fencing. I have a passion for cooking and sharing my results with others. I really enjoy volunteering, because it not only helps others but also gives me a sense of happiness and accomplishing. I have participated in many volunteer activities and I am the vice president of the school Volunteer Association. I believe in helping to influence others in any way I can. “Do unto others as you would have them do unto you” is my principle.

Chen Houfu

Hello everyone,my name is Chen Houfu. My English name is Jacob. I come from Shandong and i'm live in Ohio for my high school. I am a junior.One of my favorite hobby is play basketball. I am also like running.My favorite hobby is play game that is hard to adapt how to be good in the game.I like team work so that's why I like play basketball.And I like challenge myself so I like play hard game.I am a friendly and outgoing person .In the future I may be a engineer

Wu Yuxuan

Hello everyone, my name is Sherry. My Chinese name is Wu Yuxuan. I am 17 years old and studying at Shangshi Cambridge School. I like playing badminton, tennis, debate, speech. I am lively and cheerful and I am very glad to participate in this igem activity, which will help me a lot to improve my personal leadership and teamwork ability, also learn a lot of knowledge about biology. I hope everything goes well and everyone gets a good result.

Xu Yueran

My name is Xu Yueran, my English name is Yolanda. I come from BANZ in Shanghai, but I have lived in Suzhou. I switched to the private sector in the first semester of Grade nine. Originally, I wanted to be an art student, painting landscapes and portraits all over the world, and I have learned gouache, oil painting and sketch since I was a child. But later, I found psycholigy very interesting, so I decided to take the route of psychology. Usually, I am very cheerful, I can always help my friends feel delight when they are blue, especially like to eat all kinds of food, and also like to make new friends. I hope that I can get along with you more harmomiously in the next ten days.

Chen Yifan

Hello everyone. I am Chen Yifan, a student from Shanghai BANZ School. My English name is Aria. I am a senior one this year. It is my honor to participate in IGEM competition with my classmates. I am a member of the team. I have participated in other business competitions as the team leader before and have accumulated rich experience，such as marketing, decision-making or ppt making. I hope I can make better use of it in this competition.

Chen Huixuan

My name is Chen Huixuan and my english name is Cynthia. I'm already 15 years old and now in an international high school. My hobbies are piano, calligraphy and painting. This often allows me to make beautiful posters that everyone likes, sometimes it's an useful skill for me to attract people. I want to major in economics or psychology in the future in the university. I hope what I have learned about psychology can help people around me. I am willing to do everything I can to help all the people! I am a good communicator and have an open personality. You can contact me if you have any question, I will try to help all who ask me for help.

Chu Jiayi

"Hello everyone, my name is Chu Jiayi, and you can call me Romy. I'm a senior student from Dalian American International School and am thrilled to be a part of our iGEM team. My academic interests are pretty diverse, but I have a special place in my heart for psychology. I've always been fascinated by the human mind and how it works, and I'm always eager to learn more about this complex field of study. When I'm not buried in my psychology books, you can usually find me engaging in sports. I'm a passionate swimmer and volleyball player, having been a member of my school's volleyball team for three years. I thoroughly enjoy the teamwork and camaraderie that comes with playing as a part of a team and the sense of achievement that stems from working hard and seeing the results on the field. I believe that these experiences have not only made me a better athlete but also a more effective team player in academic settings. Traveling is another passion of mine. I love exploring new destinations, immersing myself in different cultures, and absorbing all the knowledge that comes with such experiences. I view traveling as a journey of learning and self-discovery, much like how I view the iGEM competition. Participation in the iGEM competition has been a significant part of my journey. Acting as a leader for our team, I've had the chance to apply the knowledge I've gained in my academic studies, as well as the teamwork skills I've honed on the volleyball court. This competition has expanded my knowledge and helped me grow as a person, solidifying my goals and the kind of person I want to become. Working together with my classmates on this project has been an incredible experience. I cherish the time we've spent on this project, and I firmly believe that we will gain valuable insights and experiences, regardless of the competition's outcome!"

Wang Luyao

Hello everyone,my name is Wang Luyao and my English name is Monica. I am 17 years old and a high school student from Luoyang, Henan Province. I plan to study in California after graduation. My usual hobbies are all kinds of crawling pets and listening to music. I come to participate in igem activities to learn more about various viruses and enhance my teamwork and communication skills, so as to lay a good foundation for my future development and learn from experience.I hope that in the next ten days, I can harvest professional knowledge about biology.

Wang Jiayao

My name is Wang Jiayao. I am 16 years old and l am an international high school student. I try to develop my interests in all different dimensions. For sports, I like to play tennis and badminton. And I also enjoy singing and playing the piano. In art, I like painting and drama performance. I am a conscientious and responsible person that also finish my work on time. I am good and time management and self-regulation. I am really looking forward to participate in this completion and I believe me and my team will get a good result and learn a lot during this period.

Yang Shiyu

I'm Yang Shiyu. I am a 16-year-old senior high School student from Hefei No. 1 Middle School in Anhui Province. I like playing piano and listening to music. My current major is life science and I want to study finance or venture capital in university I konw a little bit in every field but I'm all about data analysis.I like economics and I believe I can learn it well.

Xu Zihe

"Hello everyone, I am Xu Zihe. I am 17-year-old. If I were to summarize myself in one word, that would be a surfing-lover. Crawling on the surfboard and waiting for the wave. When the moment comes, stand up, plunge, glide and then ride on the crest. Voila! I now feel totally free, like the marine animal who is enjoying and inspecting her own homeland. Surfing is a sport that sums up all kinds of sensations- excitement, peacefulness, a sense of domination and even anxiety. It enriches me as a person, allowing me to experience life in the most nuanced way, and at the same time provides me opportunities to learn and mature just like this year's IGEM competition. Both are challenging, yet both allow me to become better at solving problems and cooperating with team members. I value every moment in doing project with you!"

Lin Yixin

Hello everyone, my name is Lin Yixin.My English name is Alice.I am a students of grade 2 in senior high school from Zhangzhou Experimental Middle School in Fujian Province. My hobbies are playing the piano, singing, doing some more challenging tasks, and watching fantasy movies and musicals. This is my first time to Shanghai. It is an interesting journey and a valuable life experience. I hope I can continue to make progress in the team and do my best to contribute to the team.My dream is to successfully make a hot air balloon and master its driving methods, go to the Arctic to see the aurora, do a rich landlady, travel around the world. I hope to make great achievements in music in the future.

Qian Zhiwei

Hello everyone, I am Qian Zhiwei from the wet team, who is in his third year of high school and currently studying at an international school in Shanghai. I have already learned about igem courses in the early stages. In the wet team here, what I am doing is researching the problem of plasmid and DNA recombination, which really interests me. After all, I have not been exposed to similar knowledge content in my previous study and life, and this learning method has shone brightly in my eyes, At the beginning of this experiment, unfamiliar classmates and serious experimental venues made me feel nervous. After all, I had never been exposed to such things before. However, as time passed, the tension gradually dissipated, replaced by the joy of learning knowledge. I believe that in the wet team, I will do well. Even if there are shortcomings and not perfect, I believe everything can be corrected, making me a better myself.

Gao Zihan

Hi everyone, my name is Gao Zihan. My English name is Jenn. I am 19 years old and I am a year 12 student studying aboard in Australia. I'm doing VCE courses and most of my subjects are science and math. In a group work, I'm good at team work because I alwanys find myslef cooperating well with my team members. So I'm looking forward to the upcoming iGem program. In the future, I would like to work in labs and examine interatsting topics in the field of science.
